fields_of_interest: Public Health, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: Factor Chave Avenida das Tulipas 6 - 19º andar
eu_initiatives: Activities within health politics adressing some public health issues related with head and neck cancer.
organisation_name: Grupo de Estudos de Cancro de Cabeça e Pescoço (GECCP)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Portuguese Head and Neck Cancer Study Group (GECCP) role is to develop the scientific activities; elaboration of consensuses of therapeutic orientation; organization of activities for the general population that have been aware to the problem of head and neck cancer in Portugal; bringing it to the agenda with the European awareness week for head and neck cancer; and finally the challenge of clinical research, which has now been completed with the first initiative trial of the researcher whose funding at the European level has recently been approved.
